title: Ninja Looter
description: Ninja Looter is a Minecraft mod that allows players to quickly loot items from any container by simply toggling a keybind. It is designed to enhance the quick looting experience in Minecraft, making it easier and faster to get items from chests and other containers without breaking them. The mod is purely client side and does not need to be installed on the server to function. The mod is built using Java and is compatible with Minecraft Forge mod-loader.
